sundries.translation[0].definitions[0].d: small objects that are not important enough to be named separately
sundries.translation[1].definitions[0].d: various small objects, especially ones that are not important enough to be named separately
sundries.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The Post Office also sold stationery and sundries.
His weekly expenditure included £28.23 for food, £21.38 for travel, and £22.27 for sundries.
